name: Do Your Job!
description:
Pick a Job and do it! Smash rocks, hit nails, and chop logs as best you can. If you think you're better at one job than another, you can exclusively work on that one. The high score list is all the same for each job. So, if you're the best at your job, then you're the best at this game. Stop reading this, and go Do Your Job!

Features:
• 3 Jobs to choose from
• 14 Axes, 14 Pickaxes and 14 Hammers to unlock
• Global High Score list
• 3D Graphics
• Free to Play!
